property.name: Text
property.value:
ι After one of your card effects heals horror from an investigator or Ally asset: The healed card's controller gains 1 resource.
ε effect: +1. You may heal 1 horror from an investigator or Ally asset at your location.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Deck size: 30.
Deckbuilding Options: Guardian cards (κ) level 0-3, Neutral cards level 0-5, cards that "heal horror" level 0-5, up to 15 Seeker and/or Mystic cards level 0-1 (λ and/or μ).
Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Hypnotic Therapy, Rational Thought, 1 random basic weakness.
Additional Restrictions: No Weapon cards level 1-5.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced - When the investigation phase begins: Reveal the top card of your hunch deck. Until the end of the phase, you may play that card as if it were in your hand, at -2 cost. If it is still revealed at the end of the phase, shuffle it back into your hunch deck.
ε effect: +1. You may move an Insight event from your discard pile to the bottom of your hunch deck.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Deck size: 40.
Deckbuilding options: Seeker cards (λ) level 0-5, Guardian cards (κ) level 0-2, Neutral cards level 0-5.
Deckbuilding requirements (do not count toward deck size): Detective's Colt 1911s, Unsolved Case, 1 random basic weakness.
Additional Requirements: Your deck must include at least 11 Insight events (including Unsolved Case). During the setup of each scenario, you must choose 11 Insight events from your deck (one of which must be Unsolved Case) and shuffle them into a separate "hunch deck".

property.name: Text
property.value:
Anytime you gain 1 or more resources from a card effect, place them on Family Inheritance instead of in your resource pool.
ε effect: +0. You may spend 2 resources to automatically succeed, instead.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Deck size: 30.
Deckbuilding Options: Rogue cards (ν) level 0-5, Survivor cards (ξ) level 0-2, Neutral cards level 0-5.
Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Family Inheritance, Lodge "Debts," 1 random basic weakness.
Deckbuilding Restrictions: No Illicit cards.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Diana Stanley gets +1 ά for each card beneath her.
ι After a card you own cancels or ignores a card effect or game effect, if there are fewer than 5 cards beneath Diana Stanley: Place that card facedown beneath her. Draw 1 card and gain 1 resource. (Limit once per phase.)
ε effect: +2. You may choose a card beneath Diana Stanley and add it to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Deck size: 35.
Deckbuilding options: Mystic cards (μ) level 0-5, Guardian cards (κ) level 0-2, Neutral cards level 0-5.
Deckbuilding requirements (do not count toward deck size): Twilight Blade, Dark Insight, Terrible Secret, 1 random basic weakness.
Additional Setup: You begin each game with Dark Insight as an additional card in your opening hand.

property.name: Text
property.value:
ι After you evade an enemy: Either deal 1 damage to that enemy, or move to a connecting location. (Limit once per round.)
ε effect: +2. Until the end of the round, ignore the limit on the above ι ability.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Deck size: 30.
Deckbuilding Options: Survivor cards (ξ) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, Trick cards level 0-3.
Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): "I'm done runnin'!," Hoods, 1 random basic weakness.

property.name: Text
property.value:
While you have 1 or more doom among cards you control, you may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used to play Spell cards or activate Spell η abilities.
ε effect: +1. You may add 1 doom to or remove 1 doom from a card you control.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Deck size: 30.
Deckbuilding options: Spell cards level 0-5, Mystic cards (μ) level 0-3, Neutral cards level 0-5, Occult cards level 0, up to five other level 0 Seeker and/or Survivor cards (λ and/or ξ).
Deckbuilding requirements (do not count toward deck size): Mystifying Song, Baron Samedi, 1 random basic weakness.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Carolyn Fern deck only.
η Exhaust Hypnotic Therapy: Test έ (2). If you succeed, heal 1 horror from an investigator at your location. Then, that investigator may draw 1 card.
ι After one of your other card effects heals horror from an investigator, exhaust Hypnotic Therapy: That effect heals 1 additional horror.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Revelation - Put Rational Thought into play in your threat area, with 4 horror on it. Horror on Rational Thought may be healed as if it were on Carolyn Fern. If there is no horror on Rational Thought, discard it.
You cannot heal horror from cards other than Rational Thought. You cannot gain resources from Carolyn Fern's ι ability.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Joe Diamond deck only. Uses (4 ammo).
Up to 2 Tool assets you control do not take up hand slots.
η Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +1 ή and deal +1 damage for this attack. If this attack defeats an enemy, you may move an Insight event from your discard pile to the bottom of your hunch deck.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Place 1 of your clues on the location with the highest shroud. Remove Unsolved Case from the game.
Forced - If Unsolved Case would be shuffled into your hunch deck: Add it to your threat area instead. For the remainder of the game, it gains: "Forced - When the game ends: Joe Diamond earns 2 fewer experience for this scenario."

property.name: Text
property.value:
Permanent. Preston Fairmont deck only.
η: Move all resources from this card to your resource pool.
Forced - When your turn begins: Place 4 resources (from the token pool) on this card. Resources on this card may be spent as if they were in your resource pool. Discard all resources from this card at the end of your turn.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Remove Lodge "Debts" from the game.
Forced - When the game ends or you are eliminated, if Lodge "Debts" is still in your hand: You suffer 1 mental trauma.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Diana Stanley deck only.
η: Fight. You may use ά instead of ή for this attack.
You may play or commit events and skills beneath Diana Stanley as if they were in your hand. As an additional cost to play or commit a card in this way, exhaust Twlight Blade. You cannot trigger Diana Stanley's ι ability while playing or committing a card in this way.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Diana Stanley deck only.
Fast. Play when an investigator at your location draws an encounter card or a weakness.
Cancel all of that card's effects and shuffle it back into its deck. (Do not draw a new card to replace it.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - If there are no card beneath Diana Stanley, shuffle Terrible Secret back into your deck. Otherwise, for each card beneath Diana Stanley, you must either discard that card or take 1 horror. Cannot be canceled.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Rita Young deck only.
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Ready and engage all enemies at your location. For the remainder of your turn, whenever you evade an enemy, instead of exhausting and disengaging from that enemy, you may deal it 1 damage. (All other effects of the successful evasion still apply.)

property.name: Text
property.value:
Prey - Rita Young only.
Alert. Hunter.
Forced - After you evade Hoods: It attacks you.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Marie Lambeau deck only.
Fast. Play when the agenda would advance by reaching its doom threshold.
Until the end of the phase, the agenda cannot advance by reaching its doom threshold. Remove Mystifying Song from the game.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Revelation - Put Baron Samedi into play. He cannot leave play while he has less than 3 doom on him.
Forced - When any amount of damage is placed on an investigator in Baron Samedi's location: Place 1 additional damage on that investigator.
θ Exhaust Baron Samedi: Place 1 doom on Baron Samedi. If he has 3 or more doom on him, discard him.

property.name: Text
property.value: Parley. Choose a Humanoid enemy at your location and test ή (3). This test gets +X difficulty, where X is the chosen enemy's damage value. If you succeed, discover 1 clue at your location and 1 clue at any other location.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Fast. Play only during your turn. Attach to an investigator at your location, under his or her control.
ι When you are dealt damage and/or horror: Discard Delay the Inevitable and cancel all damage and/or horror just dealt.
Forced - When the mythos phase ends: You must either spend 2 resources or discard Delay the Inevitable.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have 5 or more total remaining health and sanity, Steadfast gains ά ή (while you have 10 or more total remaining health and sanity, Steadfast gains ά ά ή ή, instead).

property.name: Text
property.value:
You get +1 ή.
ι When the game begins, if Ace of Swords is in your opening hand: Put it into play.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Uses (3 supplies).
η Exhaust Fingerprint Kit and spend 1 supply: Investigate. You get +1 έ for this investigation. If you succeed, you discover 1 additional clue at your location.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Fast. Play after you discover the last clue at your location.
Discover 2 clues at a location with a lower printed shroud value than your location.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have 4 or more cards in hand, Curiosity gains ά έ (while you have 7 or more cards in hand, Curiosity gains ά ά έ έ, instead).

property.name: Text
property.value:
You get +1 έ.
ι When the game begins, if Death XIII is in your opening hand: Put it into play.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Limit 1 per investigator.
θ Exhaust Well Connected: You get +1 skill value for this skill test for every 5 resources you have.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Fast. Play when you initiate a skill test.
Instead of the skill type indicated for this test (ά, έ, ή, or ί), this is a resource skill test. Your base skill value for this test is equal to half the number of resources in your resource pool (rounded down).

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have 5 or more resources, Cunning gains έ ί (while you have 10 or more resources, Cunning gains έ έ ί ί, instead).

property.name: Text
property.value:
You get +1 ί.
ι When the game begins, if The Moon XVIII is in your opening hand: Put it into play.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Fast. Play when an encounter card or an enemy attack would cause you to do one of the following (choose one): Discard cards from hand, lose resources, lose actions, take damage, or take horror.
You ignore that aspect of the effect. (Each other aspect resolves normally.)

property.name: Text
property.value:
Fast. Play when you would resolve an effect on a μ card that triggers when a α, β, γ, δ, or ζ symbol is revealed.
Either cancel that effect, or resolve it an additional time.

property.name: Text
property.value: While there are 3 or more doom in play, Prophesy gains ΰ (while there are 6 or more doom in play, Prophesy gains ΰ ΰ, instead).

property.name: Text
property.value:
You get +1 ά.
ι When the game begins, if Four of Cups is in your opening hand: Put it into play.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Limit 1 Footwear per investigator.
You get +1 ί.
ι After you move, but before enemies at your new location engage you, exhaust Track Shoes: Test ί (3). If you succeed, move to a connecting location.

property.name: Text
property.value:
As an additional cost to play Act of Desperation, choose and discard an Item asset that takes up at least 1 hand slot from your hand or play area.
Fight. You get +X ή and deal +1 damage for this attack, where X is the chosen asset's printed resource cost. If you succeed and that asset was in your play area, gain X resources.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control 2 or fewer Item assets, Able Bodied gains ή ί (while you control 1 or fewer Item assets, Able Bodied gains ή ή ί ί, instead).

property.name: Text
property.value:
You get +1 health and +1 sanity.
ι When the game begins, if Five of Pentacles is in your opening hand: Put it into play.

property.name: Text
property.value:
θ During your turn, remove Ace of Rods from the game: You may take an additional action this turn, during which you get +2 to each of your skills.
ι When the game begins, if Ace of Rods is in your opening hand: Put it into play.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Revelation - Put The 13th Vision into play in your threat area.
Investigators at your location fail ties during skill tests.
η η: Discard The 13th Vision.

property.name: Text
property.value:
You cannot commit cards to skill tests while The Tower XVI is in your hand.
If The Tower XVI is drawn in your opening hand during setup (before or after taking a mulligan), you cannot replace it. It must stay in your opening hand.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Easy / Standard
α: -3. If you fail and this is an attack or evasion attempt, resolve each haunted ability on your location.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Hard / Expert
α: -5. If you fail and this is an attack or evasion attempt, resolve each haunted ability on your location.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced - After doom is placed on any card: Each investigator must either take 1 damage or 1 horror (2 damage or 2 horror instead if there is 5 or more doom in play).
Forced - When any investigator is defeated, that investigator must advance this agenda. Do not remove any doom from this agenda when it advances.

property.name: Text
property.value:
In the "Missing Persons" section of your Campaign Log, next to your character's profile, make a record of that character's fate, as follows. Then flip this agenda back over.
- If you were defeated by The Spectral Watcher's attack, record (character's name) was taken by the Watcher.
- If you were defeated by a Monster enemy's attack, record (character's name) was claimed by specters.
- If there was 7 or more doom in play when this agenda advanced, and you were defeated by horror or damage dealt by the Forced ability on agenda 1a, record (character's name) disappeared into the mist.
- If you were defeated by any other effect, record(character's name) was pulled into the spectral realm.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced - When an investigator is eliminated: Place each of that investigator's clues on this act instead of his or her location.
Objective - Discover as many clues as you can before your inevitable demise.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Record in your Campaign Log you are being hunted.
Flip back to Act 1a.

property.name: Text
property.value:
ι After an enemy attacks you, even if that attack was canceled: Discover 1 clue at your location. (Limit once per round.)
ε effect: +1. Heal 1 damage and 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Setup: You begin play in the Victorian Halls. Place 1 damage on The Spectral Watcher. Search the gathered cards for 1 copy of Fate of All Fools and put it into play in your threat area. You begin with 1 resource instead of 5.
Starting Play Area: .45 Automatic (Core 16) with 2 ammo tokens remaining, Physical Training (Core 17).
Opening Hand: First Aid (Core 19), Guard Dog (Core 21), Evidence! (Core 22), Dodge (Core 23), Extra Ammunition (level 1) (Core 26), 2 copies of Delay the Inevitable (TCU 21).

property.name: Text
property.value:
ι When an investigator at your location draws a treachery from the encounter deck, discard cards from your hand with a total of at least 2 έ icons: Cancel that card's revelation effect. (Limit once per round.)
ε effect: +1. Discover 1 clue at your location.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Setup: You begin play in the Office. Search the gathered cards for 1 copy of Nether Mist and 1 copy of Obscuring Fog. Spawn the Nether Mist in the Office and attach Obscuring Fog to the Office. You begin with 3 resources instead of 5.
Starting Play Area: Nothing.
Opening Hand: Hyperawareness (Core 34), Mind over Matter (Core 36), Working a Hunch (Core 37), Barricade (Core 38), Deduction (Core 39), Magnifying Glass (level 1) (Core 40), Fingerprint Kit (TCU 24), Connect the Dots (TCU 25), 2 copies of Curiosity (TCU 26).

property.name: Text
property.value:
θ During a skill test you are performing, spend 2 resources: Reduce the difficulty of this test by 1. (Limit once per round.)
ε effect: +1. Gain 2 resources.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Setup: You begin play in the Billiards Room. Search the gathered cards for 1 copy of Shadow Hound and 1 copy of Terror in the Night. Spawn the Shadow Hound engaged with you and put Terror in the Night into play next to the agenda deck. You begin with 10 resources instead of 5.
Starting Play Area: Well Connected (TCU 28).
Opening Hand: .41 Derringer (Core 47), Opportunist (Core 53), Sure Gamble (level 3) (Core 56), 2 copies of Money Talks (TCU 29), 2 copies of Cunning (TCU 30).

property.name: Text
property.value:
ι After you succeed at a skill test during a revelation effect: Discover 1 clue at your location. (Limit once per round.)
ε effect: +1. If this is a skill test during a revelation effect, you may take an additional action during your next turn.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Setup: You begin play at the Balcony. Search the gathered cards for 1 copy of Wraith and 1 copy of Whispers in the Dark. Spawn the Wraith engaged with you and put Whispers in the Dark into play next to the agenda deck. You begin with 2 resources instead of 5.
Starting Play Area: Dig Deep (Core 77), Knife (Core 86), Flashlight (Core 87) with 2 supply tokens remaining.
Opening Hand: Stray Cat (Core 76), Lucky! (Core 80), Knife (Core 86), Flashlight (Core 87), 2 copies of Act of Desperation (TCU 37), 2 copies of Able Bodied (TCU 38).

property.name: Text
property.value:
Easy / Standard
α: -1. For each point you fail by, discard the top card of the encounter deck.
γ: -1. If you fail, after this test resolves, draw the bottommost treachery in the encounter discard pile.
δ: -3. If you fail, choose an exhausted or damaged Witch enemy at your location or at a connecting location. Ready that enemy and heal all damage from it.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Hard / Expert
α: -2. Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck equal to this test's difficulty.
γ: -2. If you fail, after this test resolves, draw the bottommost treachery in the encounter discard pile.
δ: -4. If you fail, ready each Witch enemy at your location and at each connecting location. Heal all damage from each of those enemies.

property.name: Text
property.value: Discard all but the last 5 cards from the encounter deck. The investigator with the most cards in his or her play area must draw the topmost Witch enemy in the encounter discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - At the end of the round: Place 1 doom on this agenda for each Witch enemy at the Witches' Circle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each surviving investigator is defeated and must search the collection for a random basic Omen or Curse weakness and add it to his or her deck. Each investigator who cannot suffers 1 mental trauma instead.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Locations in front of you are connected to one another. You cannot enter locations in front of other investigators.
Objective - At the end of the round, investigators may spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Each investigator must randomly choose 1 of the set-aside Arkham Woods locations, put it into play in front of him or her, and immediately move to that location (cannot be canceled).
Each investigator spawns a set-aside Goat Spawn at his or her location (if there are 4 investigators in the game, the lead investigator spawns the set-aside Relentless Dark Young, and each other investigator spawns a set-aside Goat Spawn, instead). Each investigator then tests ά or ί (3). Each investigator who succeeds exhausts that enemy and disengages from it.
Shuffle one of the set-aside copies of Daemonic Piping into the encounter deck. Place the other two copies in the encounter discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Locations in front of you are connected to one another. You cannot enter locations in front of other investigators.
Objective - If a single investigator spends the requisite number of clues, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: For the remainder of the scenario, investigators may now enter locations in front of other investigators.

property.name: Text
property.value: Locations in front of you are connected to one another.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Revelation - Put the Witches' Circle into play in the center of the play area, in front of none of the investigators. The lead investigator spawns the set-aside Anette Mason at the Witches' Circle.
Forced - After the enemy phase begins: Move each ready, unengaged Witch enemy once toward the Witches' Circle.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Locations in front of you are connected to one another.
Objective - If Anette Mason is defeated, advance.
Objective - If there are no clues on the Witches' Circle, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value:
If you advanced by defeating Anette Mason:
"Stop!" the coven's leader yells in a commanding voice, grimacing from the wounds you've inflicted. You're not sure if she's speaking to you or to the hooded women surrounding you, but regardless, there is a sudden stillness in the clearing around the circle
(->R1)
If you advanced by discovering all of the clues in the Witches' Circle:
A loud crack echoes throughout the woods as you break the circle and reverse the witches' spell. "No! They have broken the ritual!" one of the witches screams as the spell's energy backfires. White-hot lightning strikes the center of the field, sending dirt and debris flying in every direction. You duck for cover.
(->R2)

property.name: Text
property.value:
Retaliate.
Forced - After the enemy phase begins: Discard the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. Spawn each Witch enemy discarded by this effect at Anette Mason's location. If no Witch enemies are discarded by this effect, ready her.

property.name: Text
property.value:
You cannot investigate this location while you have between 3 and 10 resources.
θ: Choose an investigator at a different Witch-Haunted Woods. Move up to 3 of your resources to that investigator's resource pool, or vice versa. (Group limit once per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - After any number of clues are discovered from this location: Each investigator at this location loses an equal number of resources.

property.name: Text
property.value:
You cannot investigate this location while you have between 3 and 5 cards in hand.
θ: You choose and discard 1 card from your hand, then an investigator at a different Witch-Haunted Woods draws 1 card, or vice versa. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - When the last clue is discovered from this location: Spawn the topmost enemy in the encounter discard pile at this location. (If there are no enemies in the encounter discard pile, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until an enemy is discarded, and spawn that enemy instead.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Investigators at other Witch-Haunted Woods locations can commit 1 card to each skill test performed at this location, and vice versa.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - After any number of clues are discovered from this location: Each investigator at this location must discard an equal number of cards at random from his or her hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: ι When an enemy would spawn at a different Witch-Haunted Woods: Spawn it at this location instead. Then, it makes an immediate attack against each investigator at this location.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Easy / Standard
α: -1 (-3 instead if your location is haunted).
γ: -2. If you fail and this is an attack or evasion attempt, resolve each haunted ability on your location.
δ: -2. If there is a Spectral enemy at your location, take 1 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Hard / Expert
α: -2 (-4 instead if your location is haunted).
γ: -3. If this is an attack or evasion attempt, resolve each haunted ability on your location.
δ: -4. If there is a Spectral enemy at your location, take 1 damage and 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Silver Twilight enemies cannot be damaged or defeated.
Forced - When you draw a Monster enemy: Instead of spawning it, set it aside, out of play, and place 1 doom on this agenda. This effect can cause this agenda to advance.

property.name: Text
property.value:
If the investigators do not possess 3 π clues as a group, they lose all of their clues.
If the investigators possess at least 3 π clues as a group, they must spend 3 π clues and spawn the set-aside Josef Meiger enemy at the location other than the Entry Hall that is farthest from all investigators.
Open the Campaign Guide and proceed to Interlude I: A Record of Those Lost.
Once this interlude has been resolved, remove all clues from each location in play, and advance to act 1b.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Each Silver Twilight enemy gains Victory 0, and counts as an investigator for the purpose of determining where hunter enemies move during the enemy phase.
Forced - After the 'hunter enemies move' step of the enemy phase: Each ready Spectral enemy deals its damage value to each Humanoid enemy at its location.

property.name: Text
property.value:
- If the investigators are at act 2, they are trapped inside the spectral realm. (->R3)
- If the investigators are at act 3, they barely escape with their lives. Each investigator who has not resigned is defeated and suffers 1 physical trauma.

property.name: Text
property.value: Objective - Find information about the disappearances by discovering as many clues as you can. (Do not advance until you are instructed.) (Hint: it may be worthwhile to investigate the last known locations of the missing persons.)

property.name: Text
property.value:
Move each investigator and each enemy currently in the Entry Hall to the Victorian Halls.
For each location in play, find the set-aside Spectral version of that location and swap them (all tokens and cards at the former location are now considered to be at the new location). If there is an investigator at that location, reveal it.
In player order, each investigator spawns one of the set-aside Monster enemies at his or her location, until each of the set-aside Monster enemies has been spawned.
Spawn the set-aside The Spectral Watcher enemy in the Entry Hall. Shuffle the remainder of the set-aside The Watcher encounter set and the set-aside Realm of Death encounter set into the encounter deck, along with the encounter discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value:
The mist blocking your escape recedes. Reveal the Entry Hall.
Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced - At the end of the round: Each Silver Twilight enemy in the Entry Hall escapes; place them beneath the Entry Hall, out of play. Move each ready Silver Twilight enemy with the aloof keyword once toward the Entry Hall.
Objective - If each undefeated investigator has resigned, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Resign. "I guess there is nothing to those disappearances after all."

property.name: Text
property.value: η: You go looking for trouble. Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a Silver Twilight enemy is discarded. Spawn that enemy in the Victorian Halls. Then, gain 2 clues (from the token pool). (Group limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: η: You spend some time schmoozing with the other guests. Either gain 2 resources, or spend 2 resources to gain 1 clue (from the token pool). (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Test ί (3) to compete with the other guests. If you succeed, gain 1 clue (from the token pool). (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - When the round ends, if there is at least 1 investigator in the Master Bedroom: Place 1 doom on the nearest Silver Twilight enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: η Discard cards from your hand with a total of at least 3 έ icons: Parley. The guest here knows more about the Lodge than they let on. Gain 2 clues (from the token pool). (Group limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Silver Twilight enemy in the Office loses aloof.

property.name: Text
property.value: The Entry Hall is blocked by a wall of spectral mist. You cannot enter the Entry Hall. Silver Twilight enemies cannot spawn in the Entry Hall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Haunted - Lose 2 resources. For each resource you cannot lose from this effect, take 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Haunted - You must either discard an asset you control or take 1 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Haunted - Place 1 of your clues on Master Bedroom.

property.name: Text
property.value: Haunted - Each of your cards with health takes 1 direct damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Haunted - Choose and discard a card from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Retaliate.
η If no other Silver Twilight enemy has doom on it: Parley. Test έ (4) to convince Josef that this is not your doing. If you fail, Josef Meiger attacks you. If you succeed, flip this card over and resolve its text.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Remove all doom from this card.
For the remainder of the game, doom cannot be placed on Silver Twilight enemies, and Josef Meiger gains aloof.
Flip this card back to its enemy side and disengage it from all investigators.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Alert. Hunter.
Forced - When The Spectral Watcher is defeated: Instead of discarding it, heal all damage from it, disengage it from all investigators, and exhaust it. It does not ready during the upkeep phase this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Heal 3 damage from The Spectral Watcher. Ready The Spectral Watcher. It moves, engages, and attacks as if it were the enemy phase. Throughout the resolution of this effect, The Spectral Watcher gains "Prey - You."

property.name: Text
property.value:
Prey - Least remaining sanity.
Alert. Hunter. Retaliate.
Forced - When the enemy phase ends: Piper of Azathoth attacks each investigator it is not engaged with at its location (regardless of whether it is ready or exhausted).

property.name: Text
property.value:
Surge.
Revelation - If Piper of Azathoth is in play, deal 1 horror to each investigator at its location and at each connecting location. Otherwise, put Daemonic Piping into play next to the agenda deck.
If there are 3 copies of Daemonic Piping in play, discard them and spawn the Piper of Azathoth engaged with its prey (from any out of play area).

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Discard the top 2 cards of the encounter deck. If this effect causes the encounter deck to run out of cards, draw the topmost Hex card in the encounter discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Retaliate.
Priestess of the Coven gets +1 fight and +1 evade for each Witch enemy in the encounter discard pile (to a maximum of +3 fight and +3 evade).
Forced - When the encounter deck runs out of cards: Priestess of the Coven readies and attacks each investigator at its location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Test ά (3). For each point you fail by, discard 1 random card from your hand. For each card you cannot discard, take 1 horror or 1 damage. This test gets +1 difficulty for each copy of Diabolic Voices in the encounter discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Revelation - Put Wracked into play in your threat area.
You get -1 to each of your skills during the first skill test you perform each round.
η: Test ά (3). If you succeed, discard Wracked. If there is an exhausted Witch enemy at your location, this test is automatically successful.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Revelation - Put Bedeviled into play in your threat area.
You cannot trigger η abilities on cards you control.
η: Test ά (3). If you succeed, discard Bedeviled. If there is an exhausted Witch enemy at your location, this test is automatically successful.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Spawn - Any empty location.
Aloof.
Forced - After Lodge Neophyte enters play: Place 1 doom on it.
η: Parley. Test ά (2). If you succeed, remove all doom from Lodge Neophyte.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Spawn - Any empty location.
Aloof. Retaliate.
Forced - When the mythos phase ends: Place 1 doom on Keeper of Secrets.
η: Parley. Test έ (3). If you succeed, remove all doom from Keeper of Secrets.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Place 1 doom on the nearest Cultist enemy. Then, until the end of the round, increase the difficulty to fight, evade, or parley with that enemy by 2. If no doom is placed by this effect, Mysteries of the Lodge gains surge.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Revelation - Put Evil Past into play in your threat area if there is no copy of it in your threat area (if there is, discard Evil Past and it gains surge instead).
Forced - When the encounter deck runs out of cards: Take 2 horror and test ά (3). If you succeed, discard Evil Past.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Test ά (5). For each point you fail by, discard the top card of the encounter deck. If a Curse treachery is discarded by this effect, deal 1 direct damage to your investigator and to each of your Ally assets.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Prey - Investigator at the location with the most clues.
Aloof. Hunter.
Nether Mist's location gains: "Haunted - Nether Mist attacks you."

property.name: Text
property.value:
Prey - Lowest ί.
Hunter. Retaliate.
Forced - After Shadow Hound attacks you: Resolve each haunted ability on your location.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Revelation - Put Whispers in the Dark into play next to the agenda deck.
Each location gains: "Haunted - Take 1 horror."
Forced - When the round ends: Discard Whispers in the Dark.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Hunter.
Forced - When Wraith is defeated by damage (except from a Spell or Relic): Instead of discarding it, attach it to its location. Attached location gains: "Haunted - Spawn Wraith at this location."

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Test ί (3). For each point you fail by, take 1 damage. If your location is haunted, as an additional cost for an investigator to commit 1 or more cards to this skill test, he or she must resolve each haunted ability on this location.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Revelation - Put Realm of Torment into play in your threat area.
Forced - When your turn begins: Resolve each haunted ability on your location.
Forced - When your turn ends: Test ά (3). If you succeed, discard Realm of Torment.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Surge.
Revelation - Resolve each haunted ability on your location.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Revelation - Test ά (4). If you fail, put Terror in the Night into play next to the agenda deck. If you fail by 3 or more, Terror in the Night gains surge.
If there are 3 copies of Terror in the Night next to the agenda deck, discard them and each investigator takes 3 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Peril.
Revelation - You must decide (choose one):
- If there is no other copy of Fate of All Fools in play, put Fate of All Fools into play in your threat area.
- An investigator with another copy of Fate of All Fools in his or her threat area takes 2 direct damage.
- Place 1 doom on another copy of Fate of All Fools.
